an5.293:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato ajivako yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an5.293:1.3: Panatipati hoti, adinnadayi hoti, abrahmacari hoti, musavadi hoti, suramerayamajjapamadatthayi hoti.
an5.293:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato ajivako yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye”ti.
